page.title: 07Land Drainage-Hythe.
page.content: Our area is south of the docks on the other side of the River Test.It is all{Reclaimed Land } which has been made by pumping mud dredged up from the bottom of Southampton Water. We saw a well that drained the water from the{waste land. There was an orange flag, warning people not to trespass on this land. There was a pipe that pumped the mud on to the land but it was no longer used. Across the river there were boats docking in{Southampton Docks. There was a ditch that had just been cleaned out but people were throwing stones into it. From our survey area we could see a building site where men were building modern houses on a new estate.
